vsParam:
Oh no, I didn't expect to come to a different world...
Ah, I haven't introduced myself.

My name is Marlone! I am an alchemist in Salburg Academy.
You can just call me Marie!

Okay~! Nice to meet you, Marie!
You also study in an Academy.

Oh, yeah. There's an Academy in this world, too, huh?
I do study in the Academy, but...

My grades are quite poor. I even got the lowest score
in the history of the Academy...

Uh, it can't be true!?
In this case, you can't graduate...

Yeah, you are right. Actually, I am taking a special
examination to decide if I can graduate...

You are so unlucky to be sent here at such a critical moment...
Ah, right

How about you transfer to our Academy
before you go back to your world?

Our Academy also teaches alchemy,
I think you'll learn something.

Uh, this is a good idea! Sounds very interesting!
But is everyone okay with it...
You are very welcomed join us!

That's great, thank you so much, [px]!
You really are a big help!

"Family member“? You mean member of this big family of
the Academy? Ha-ha! It sounds lovely!

I am very glad to be a "family member" for
[px] and everyone here!
You are very welcomed join us!

That's great, thank you so much, [px]!
You really are a big help!

"Family member“? You mean member of this big family of
the Academy? Ha-ha! It sounds lovely!

I am very glad to be a "family member" for
[px] and everyone here!

Yeah. In this case, I'll ask the Headmaster to
allow you to be exempted from the transfer exam.

This may be a little premature...
But Marie, welcome to the Academy!

Ha-ha, thank you so much!
Guys, nice to meet you guys!
